job_title: Architect with Asset & Wealth Management exp
jd:
Role: .Net Architect with Asset & Wealth Management Exp
Location: San Ramon, CA - 3 days onsite per week
End Date: start as a 3 month contract, possibility of extension and also looking for those interested in conversion
Interview process: 2 internal, possible client

Notes: Need Asset Management experience - Some recent rejections were due to not having Asset Management experience. They should also have experience architecting any system or having helped architect it, as well as done delivery mgmt or provided Tech leadership.

Updated Requirements: Recent .NET Architect experience and .NET expertise
Experience building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud. Asset/Wealth Management experience is a must

Responsibilities:
Target Architecture of the application
Tech Leadership across Client Teams
Build a tech roadmap for the product
Provide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloud
We need a solid .NET Architect with experience in building UI-based applications (React/Angular), Winforms/WCF on Azure Cloud.
Must have played a role of Sr. Architect
Must have a solid communication to collaboratively drive building
Target Architecture of the application
Tech Leadership across Client Teams
Build a tech roadmap for the product
Provide Tech Leadership to the implementation team for migration of D&C’s on-prem EWS application to cloud
AWM experience required (asset and wealth management)
